channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Donald Trump Doesn’t Need X—but Elon Musk Desperately Needs Him Back
item.description: Musk’s stagnating platform has been hemorrhaging users and advertisers for years. Trump’s sudden return could give it a much-needed boost.

item.title: Payoneer scoops up Skuad, Robinhood’s strong Q2, and X is making progress on payments
item.description: Welcome to TechCrunch Fintech! This week, we’re looking at Payoneer’s $61 million acquisition of Skuad, Robinhood and Dave’s second-quarter results, X’s progress on its payments and more. To get a roundup of TechCrunch’s biggest and most important fintech stories delivered to your inbox every Tuesday at 8:00 a.m. PT, subscribe here. The big story Last […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: 6 Best Cordless Vacuums for Carpet, Hardwood, and Hard-to-Reach Areas (2024)
item.description: Look Ma, no wires! These stick vacs are the best battery-operated dust suckers.

item.title: Encord lands new cash to grow its data labeling tools for AI
item.description: Labeling and annotation platforms might not get the attention flashy new generative AI models do. But they’re essential. The data on which many models train must be labeled, or the models wouldn’t be able to interpret that data during the training process. Annotation is a vast undertaking, requiring thousands to millions of annotations for the […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: The 11 Best Travel Adapters, Tested and Reviewed (2024)
item.description: When going abroad, the right plugs are essential to keeping your gadgets charged. These are our favorites.

item.title: Singaporean investment app Syfe pulls in $27M to hasten growth in Asia Pacific
item.description: The Asia Pacific region has long been an important market for wealth management firms with the plethora of developing economies and a burgeoning retail investment market. But there’s still a huge market to capture: About 40% to 45% of personal financial assets in the region are held in cash and deposits as of 2023, according […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Moog Spectravox Review: OK Vocoder, Excellent Toy
item.description: The latest semi-modular synth is a mediocre vocoder but an exciting sonic playground

item.title: Twitch rolls out video stories to challenge Instagram
item.description: After launching photo and text stories last year, Twitch is now introducing video stories. Streamers can now film 60-second videos in the Twitch mobile app or upload a video from their camera roll. Twitch sees the new feature as a way for streamers to take viewers with them when they’re on the go and away […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Extreme Weather Poses a Challenge for Heat Pumps
item.description: Stronger winds, bouts of extreme low temperature, and higher humidity pose difficult but surmountable challenges for heat pumps.

item.title: California AI bill SB 1047 aims to prevent AI disasters, but Silicon Valley warns it will cause one
item.description: SB 1047 has drawn the ire of Silicon Valley players large and small, including venture capitalists, big tech trade groups, researchers and startup founders. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.
